name: Monsters Road: Invasion
description:
Info:
Monsters Road: Invasion is an action, adventure, point and click and strategy rpg video game. It is the fourth game of the series of the same name, created by Alhavera Studios. This game is very similar with the last game, Monsters Road : Global Revolution, but this comes with a lot of new things!

Story:
This game tells the story of the brave fighter Tommy Griffin and his girlfriend, Bianca. The action takes place between 2010 and 2011, during which time the planet was invaded again by monsters, but on a new plane. These were much more, making the fights much harder than before. Tommy thus establishes "Angelic Laws", laws by which people were freed from the torments of monsters, who owned "Demonic Laws". Thus, he and Bianca start a terrible war in order to regain the lost territories in front of the monsters. In the meantime, they have an economic boom and can create their own army, play at the casino, vote for laws, import and much more, becoming much stronger for a while. However, the monsters copy their plan and put them in trouble, at which point Tommy's troubles begin. He loses a lot of the team, he suffers, he loses loved ones, but he discovers others that will help him. Will Tommy be able to overcome all obstacles and end this terrible war once and for all? This depends on you!
